data.title: New Job
data.statement:
Joe has been looking for a new role for a few months. He has made a list of potential shows he could be in. His first choice will be made according to the series that will be filmed closest to his city (referring to the city's name with the smallest length) and in <<case of tie>>, based on the city that will bring in the most money.

His best offer would be the <<nearest city>> with the <<highest salary>>.

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn:
3
Chicken-Dance Maldives 3000
Love Wellington 3200
Travel Prague 2000

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:

data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read option:string(256)

write The series
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: [[n]], an integer denoting the number of series
<<Next [[n]] lines>>: the series, the city and the salary(an integer), where all elements are separated by a space.
data.outputDescription: The series in which he can play.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Joe has been looking for a new role for a few months. He has made a list of potential shows he could be in. His first choice will be made according to the series that will be filmed closest to his city (referring to the city's name with the smallest length) and in case of tie, based on the city that will bring in the most money.

His best offer would be the nearest city with the highest salary.
Input
Line 1: n, an integer denoting the number of series
Next n lines: the series, the city and the salary(an integer), where all elements are separated by a space.
Output
The series in which he can play.
Constraints
Example
Input
3
Chicken-Dance Maldives 3000
Love Wellington 3200
Travel Prague 2000
Output
Travel
